name: Winson Herry
review: Director Nelson weaves an intricate, entertaining, socially relevant and extremely likable film in his latest film.. Doctor. A host of excellent artistes and a magical musical score by Aniruddh adds to the charm.

name: Richard N Nees
review: Siva Karthikeyan is the biggest highlight of the film as he showcases a different side to his personality. He as an army doctor evokes good comedy, drama, and carries the film on his shoulder.

name: Tina D McClure
review: Well scripted Dark Humour Comedy. When it comes to the comedy genre, we shouldn't expect the logics. So I strongly say there was no lacks. Siva and Vinay character designed very well.
